Sets debugging output via attr.
---
{"debug":false}
---
<vue-component-usage debug="true">testcase</vue-component-usage>
---
<vue-component-usage-test language="html">
<template v-slot:code>testcase</template>
<template v-slot:result>testcase</template>
</vue-component-usage-test>
<!-- Rewriter result:
<vue-component-usage-test language="html">
<template v-slot:code>testcase</template>
<template v-slot:result>testcase</template>
</vue-component-usage-test>
-->
